ovdesc.p: This table will have the details about Monthly,Quarterly,Annual and Rolling average Balances.

desc.p: The Table will be updated through the COB process on daily basis. And the ID will be on LINE.NO-YEAR-COMPANY.
This field denotes the summation of closing balance of month to date for a particular line will and this will be restored to Zero every month.
This field denotes the summation of closing balance of Quarter to date for a particular line and this will be restored to Zero every quater
This field denotes the summation of closing balance of year to date for the particular line and this will be restored to Zero every Year.
As per the rolling period defined in the RLGAAP.PARAMETER, the rolling average balance for the GL line will be updated here.
The monthly average balance will be stored for respective month
The Quaterly average balance will be stored for each quater.
The yearly average balance will be stored for present year.
